item.title: Trump transition updates: Trump taps longtime ally as agriculture secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is continuing to announce his picks for top jobs inside his administration.

item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: IDF prepares Beirut strikes despite cease-fire push
item.description: Israel continues strikes across Lebanon -- including intense attacks in Beirut -- amid a major multi-national cease-fire push.

item.title: An average of 140 women and girls were killed by a partner or relative per day in 2023, the UN says
item.description: Two U.N. agencies say an average of 140 women and girls were killed by an intimate partner or family member per day last year
